}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== PLANET VC-231 is an Ethernet-over-VDSL2 Converter with high performance. It is designed based on two core networking technology, Ethernet and VDSL2 (Very-high-data-rate Digital Subscriber Line 2). The VDSL2 technology offers absolutely fastest data transmission speed over existing copper telephone lines without the need of rewiring. The VC-231 supports ultra-high performance to the pervasive telephone line network with up to 100/100Mbps symmetric data rate within 300m and 50/2Mbps for 1.4km long range connections.
*This device uses a [[Metanoia]] MT2301 (''Merlin'') VDSL DMT and MT3301 AFE combo for the VDSL2 modem portion. *Models: Planet VC-231/G/GP/GF {{See also|Planet VC-230N|Planet}}
==Pictures== <center>'''User Images''' <gallery caption="internal" mode="slideshow"> File:VC-231_BOARD_TOP.JPG|board top File:VC-231_HEATSINK_REMOVED.JPG|board without heatsink File:VC-231_BOARD_BOTTOM.JPG|board bottom </gallery></center>[[Has images::internal| ]]
